name: Figa (niegotowe)
description:
game made during Metroidvania Month 19 game jam

FIGA

The biggest corporation in the world - FIGA company, took control over the world. Your mission is to put end to this!

Save the world from FIGA!

The CEO of the FIGA company - Figa is waiting for you in his office on top of the FIG TOWER.

Fight robots!

To enter there you have to clear the NANO CORP OFFICE from dangerous robots and destroy their boss - NANO MANAGER.

Good luck!

controls: (tested on keyboard/mouse and xbox controller only)

  • movement - ad / arrows / left analogue stick (controller)
  • attack - mouse left button / x (controller)
  • jump - w / space / a (controller)
